steps: step 2: Click on link testSuites (SmokeTestSuite) -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/executions/*'
step 3: Click on link Tests -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/test-design/test-cases'
step 5: Click on link TestSuites2 -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/test-design/test-suites'
step 9: Click on link testSuiteLinks (SmokeTestSuite) -> Navigate to page 'team/*/project/*/test-design/test-suites/*'
